title: Pixel 3XL exposed to salt water, fixable?
content:
My Pixel 3XL was exposed to some saltwater...

The phone froze and tried to reboot (both Google logo and G logo loaded), then blacked out.
Now my phone is dead. 

I've tried the methods listed in this link, but was unsuccessful in getting a response from my phone. 

Would appreciate any help in figuring out if my phone can be fixed, and what exactly is dead.

Thanks!
